body.raw: You‚Äôve been in town for a few weeks now, and are starting to settle into your new life in the big city. It‚Äôs been busy, so you‚Äôve hardly had a chance to go out or meet new people. You spend your evenings hoping that somebody will invite you to a rave. Perhaps the only option is to seek the counsel of the rave gods.

body.raw: "Oh great gods of rave, I beg you to drop the beat on this household!" As you fall to your knees and start to evoke the rhythm from within, there is a knock at your door. You jump to your feet and swing open the door. Expecting to see another party animal, you are instead greeted by an `envelope` at your feet. The `envelope` has a lime green wax seal pressed into the seam.
